website_summaries.verdict: This affordable option includes all the essentials and accommodates extra drinks as well. Whether you're planning an all-day trip or can't resist packing extras, this backpack’s larger-than-average capacity should suffice.
pros: Whether you use both for wine or one for water or soda, this backpack comes with 2 detachable bottle holders so you'll never be left thirsty
Padded straps with a built-in phone pocket
Includes cutting board, salt and pepper shakers, and bottle opener
Comes with large water-resistant picnic blanket
cons: Utensil handles and salt/pepper shakers are plastic, but seem sturdy enough and are dishwasher safe

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This seems well-made and well designed.The blanket is very thick and adds a bit of weight to the pack, but is perfect for picnics on the ground. I just needed a table cloth so I'll probably use the blanket for other things. I actually thought it came with just 1 napkin, missing 3, but they are used as cushions between the other plates! It will be great fun to use this!
customer_reviews.author: P. L. miller

customer_reviews.title: One "Pro", many, many "Cons".  Beware & don't purchase this!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the backpack itself is very sturdy & worth the money I paid. I like the amount of room in the insulated food compartment. Nice to have 2 insulated drink holders, albeit very skinny ones. The plates: too small, the napkins: very flimsy, (will likely disintegrate on their own). The glasses & silverware are extremely cheap. I would never try to wash any of the above in dishwasher or clothes washer. I bought 2 of these for Christmas gifts & was appalled at how cheap the above parts were. While this item might be okay for teens going out on a picnic date, I absolutely cannot recommend it for any adult. An adult would immediately see the problems.
customer_reviews.author: Cammie Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Day Pack for Picnics
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want anything too fancy, but I also didn't want the cheap bottom of the line packs. This backpack has just enough elegance to make a day hike special. The oversized blanket is damp-proof, and there are two bottle holders (one is supposed to be for water, but we used both for wine.) The plates are scratchproof but not overly heavy, and there's even cheeseboard with its own knife. It's comfortable to wear, and even more comfortable after eating and drinking the contents at mid-day! The pack has extra thick, padded shoulder straps so it doesn't dig into the shoulders or back. Would love to have more choice of colors maybe, but otherwise the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Street

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift, then bought again for me!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Went between this one and another but picked this one and glad I did. It serves four and looks great! Everything stays where it should in the backpack and it's still light weight. There's a good amount of room too for my foods. It doesn't have a chest strap but if that's the only down fall - who cares! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Venancio

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for four
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It’s great! Everything is included: forks, spoons, knives, plates, napkins, salt and pepper shakers, small cutting/cheese board, cheese knife, plastic glasses, and a blanket. The side pockets and inside are insulated well, and are very roomy. Quality picnic bag at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi  A Thorn

customer_reviews.title: ... done by a previous customer and I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this backpack on the strength of the video review done by a previous customer and I am very happy with it. I ordered the 4 person one and was concerned that the food compartment was too small. (It is very narrow) but it help more than enough food for three people, our drinks stayed pleasantly cool all day. This is a very classy item and I felt very sophisticated using it. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Donated it as a basket for charity. It got the most submissions out of 14 other baskets. In fairness, I also had 2 really nice bottles of wine to accompany it, but it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. I gave it as a wedding gift and had a friend monogram the front. It turned out beautifully. Definitely a must have. And it's adorable too.
customer_reviews.author: Twill

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler backpack
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift for a wedding. Love the set-up, quality, "how to wash" note included and room for lunch in cooler portion of back pack. We hope the newlyweds enjoy it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: ... is filled with everything someone would need for a great meal outdoors
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is filled with everything someone would need for a great meal outdoors! I gave this as a Christmas gift and the recipients LOVED it! It is unique, very well made, high quality, compact, durable, and fully loaded. I would highly recommend purchasing this item. The colors are beautiful and true to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Britany R.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love love!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!! Took it to the beach and it was great! Love having everything I need! Also has plenty of room for food depending on the size containers you use. Wine holders were a bit tight for larger water bottles but I made it work!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: We use it everywhere. It's a complete grab and go picnic in a flash. Run by a sandwich shop, grab a couple bottles of wine and become Mr Romance in a snap. For a bigger meal you'll still need another cooler but this saves the hassle of packing up paper plates and plastic forks. And it's a way classier way to picnic. Blanket included!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick F

customer_reviews.title: Setup for 4 for the price of 2!
customer_reviews.text: What a great picnic backpack! The best feature about this is the setting for four at about the same price others are selling with only a setup for two. Well made stainless steel cutlery, heavy plastic plates and cups make this stand out from others I have seen. Great insulation with plenty of room for food storage. High quality material stitching. Definitely worth the money. I added a video and a few pictures to show a little better detail.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME IDEA
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a gift under a charity wine themed Christmas tree. The winning bidder loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli L. Umstead

customer_reviews.title: Love This!
customer_reviews.text: Used this with the grands on an outing - it was so nice to have all the plates, utensils, etc. needed! Also, being a backpack style was MUCH easier to carry than the old basket I had! I love that the side bottle holders can be taken off if you don't need them as well!
customer_reviews.author: Letty57

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a wedding gift. It was very pretty and seemed well made. The young couple loved it because they can take it on bike rides or hikes and concerts in the park etc. We loaded it with wine, cheeses and gourmet snacks. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not quite large enough
customer_reviews.text: I already had a Coleman Picnic backpack, but over the years the straps were wearing thin. This backpack was as described, my only complaint is the Coleman backpack had a larger insulated compartment and the pocket on the outside was large enough to hold a box of crackers.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa V Fry

customer_reviews.title: I thought it looked really nice, very organized and easy to load up and ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas gift. It was well received. I thought it looked really nice, very organized and easy to load up and go.
customer_reviews.author: gotsol

customer_reviews.title: I'm small framed and I love how light the backpack is and easy to carry ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm small framed and I love how light the backpack is and easy to carry on my back. It can hold quite a bit of food and I like the two bottle holders. The blanket is big enough for 4 people to sit on comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to using it today. My wife loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: Great wedding gift! Took to my local embroidery store and for $8 it was a personalized gift and I loaded it with goodies. This is my wedding goto!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: It's a great backpack.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this once. The wine opener fell apart on the first bottle we attempted to open. Luckily we were at an outdoor concert and there were others with quality openers. The blanket can be used to keep you warm if you need it. It's a great backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Legswalker

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: This pack seems to have it all. We purchased these as Christmas gifts for our administrative team and everyone seemed happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love it and use it a lot for our little hikes and picnics
customer_reviews.author: Durr

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! Don't even question it, just buy it lol
customer_reviews.author: B-Rad

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing buy for such a steal, it's a little tight for 4 people but it's a great convenience to holding a basket
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Vega

customer_reviews.title: My favorite purchase of 2018!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this!! Great quality, easy to clean and so pretty!! I want to gift them to everyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Murphy

customer_reviews.title: good materials used
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, good materials used. EVERYTHING needed is there. Customer service prompt and helpful when I had a question. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and they were super excited. I'll be purchasing one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Brockopp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of this bag and the plates, utensils and cups
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Ok-ok
customer_reviews.text: Beware if gifting, the glasses are cheap plastic. Overall ok.
customer_reviews.author: Pixel 3 XL user

customer_reviews.title: Perfect picnic backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was everything described and more. I got to take it to an outdoor concert and had a lovely picnic. At one point it started down pouring but everything inside the backpack stayed dry!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It easily fits everything I need to carry and keeps my ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this for picnics and outdoor concerts all summer long. It easily fits everything I need to carry and keeps my wine cold. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. The pack is nicely organized and the insulated storage is a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Don G

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product for a great price. Everything was really nice. Customer service was fantastic and prompt. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It is just as nice as the pictures. It has everything you need to go on a picnic. Love that it has salt and pepper shakers. Just pop your food and drinks in the insulated compartments and you are ready to go. Even has a knife and cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this picnic backpack!!! Bought as a gift and will be buying one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: This came with only 1 or 4 napkins but not sure how to get it remedied with it returning the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Korina A. Rivero

customer_reviews.title: She is pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister. She is pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Picnic Set
customer_reviews.text: Nicely designed and seems well made. Everything you need for a nice picnic, except the food and drink! Good packaging so it's easy to carry and use.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Seam torn on backpack strap
customer_reviews.text: Looked fine out of the box until I discovered a seam had already torn on the reverse side of the right backpack strap; returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Philip M. Spoehr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute backpack with everything you need for a fun picnic!
customer_reviews.author: Megan G

customer_reviews.title: Joli!
customer_reviews.text: Tel que je l'attendais. Conforme à ce qui était attendu. Joli.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bacon

customer_reviews.title: the couple was excited and pleased to receive it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a wedding gift, the couple was excited and pleased to receive it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is an awesome backpack. My friends had a great time in our picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Iliana ixcel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure the couple will love it. very well made and included everything for ...
customer_reviews.text: bought for wedding gift. I'm sure the couple will love it. very well made and included everything for a great picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine M. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very durable backpack and filled with everything you could need on a picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper BROKE upon ARRIVAL
customer_reviews.text: It was broke when I received it Amazon gave me tons of issues to try to replace. For the price I expect this to be high quality!! don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Good Times Picnics
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that there are two detachable bottle holders, and the straps are really nice and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: 2 in 1 Connector Jack 3.5mm Adapter …
product_meta.description:
We love picnics at Mister Alfresco and after using our picnic cooler backpack, we are sure you will too.

Whether it is with a loved one on a date watching the sunset outdoors or inside on a rainy day with your family, a picnic is always great fun, however nothing can be more annoying when you carry your bulky picnic basket set to wherever you need it only to find that you have forgotten something. 

Well you won’t have that problem with this picnic basket cooler for 4 people as we have INCLUDED EVERYTHING for you.

Included is: salt & pepper shakers, 4 sets of spoons, knives and forks, a cutting board and knife, 4 plastic wine glasses, 4 plates, a waterproof picnic blanket, a corkscrew and 2 detachable water holders. All you need to add is the food for endless outdoor memories 

TheLIGHT-WEIGHT, STRONG, backpack makes it easier to carrier around than many other picnic basket sets and the extra bottle holder allows you to keep your water cool as well as your wine (or whatever you choose to drink).

This wine picnic set also comes with its’ own drawstring dust bag so you can store safely when not in use.
We are so sure your will love our picnic cooler backpack we offer a MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. If you are not happy with your purchase just let us know and we will give you a refund. 

So don’t delay you are just one click away from the ultimate picnic experience.
feature_bullets: THE PERFECT INSULATED PICNIC SET FOR 4. The backpack comes with a large cooler compartment which is waterproof and keeps your food cool for hours.

THE ULTIMATE PICNIC BAG SET. EVERYTHING IS INCLUDED. This picnic bag set includes, 4 plates, 4 plastic glasses, 4 knives, forks, spoons, cheese board, cutting knife, salt & pepper shakers, 2 detachable bottle coolers, waterproof picnic blanket, 4 napkins and a corkscrew. All you need to add is the food and drink for plenty of memorable times with friends and family.

LOOKS GREAT AND LIGHT-WEIGHT. Dimensions: and weighs only lb making it one of the lighter picnic bag sets available yet still plenty of space to pack what you need. Color is a stylish black with striped napkins and matching waterproof picnic blanket. All items are dishwasher safe.

2 INSULATED BOTTLE HOLDERS. Want to keep your bottle of water cool as well as the wine? Don’t worry unlike other wine picnic sets available we provide 2 bottle holders. Both are completely detachable so if you don’t need them you don’t have to take them. In fact all features are detachable so the bag also makes the perfect insulated lunch backpack.

COMFORTABLE TO USE. Padded, adjustable straps and strong carry handle make this bag easier to move around than many other wine picnic baskets. It also comes with it’s own drawstring dust bag for easy storage.
